org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.igfs

Interface IgfsServerHandler


  • public interface IgfsServerHandler
    IGFS server message handler. Server component that is plugged in to the server implementation to handle incoming messages asynchronously.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IgniteInternalFuture<IgfsMessage> handleAsync(IgfsClientSession ses, IgfsMessage msg, DataInput in)
      Asynchronously handles incoming message.
      void onClosed(IgfsClientSession ses)
      Handles handles client close events.
      void stop()
      Stops handling of incoming requests.

    • Method Detail

      • handleAsync

        @Nullable
IgniteInternalFuture<IgfsMessage> handleAsync(IgfsClientSession ses,
                                                        IgfsMessage msg,
                                                        DataInput in)
        Asynchronously handles incoming message.
        Parameters:
        ses - Client session.
        msg - Message to process.
        in - Data input. Stream to read from in case if this is a WRITE_BLOCK message.
        Returns:
        Future that will be completed when response is ready or null if no response is required.

      • onClosed

        void onClosed(IgfsClientSession ses)
        Handles handles client close events.
        Parameters:
        ses - Session that was closed.

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws IgniteCheckedException
        Stops handling of incoming requests. No server commands will be handled anymore.
        Throws:
        IgniteCheckedException - If error occurred.
